body: I don't really play video games anymore and I would really like to have all my posts deleted for privacy reasons.
body_tagged: I don't really play video games anymore and I would really like to have all my posts deleted for privacy reasons.
title: I NEED HELP

replies.body: it doesn't show up on the new forums. so youre fine
replies.body_tagged: it doesn't show up on the new forums. so youre fine

replies.body: If they are deleted, there will be nothing changed. Avicus still has your IP address, it does not matter if you delete every single post that you've made.
replies.body_tagged: If they are deleted, there will be nothing changed. Avicus still has your IP address, it does not matter if you delete every single post that you've made.

replies.body:
http://old.avicus.net/CobbleBrat
They still show up there.

replies.body: You can archive your own posts on old.avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: You can archive your own posts on old.avicus.net

replies.body: What Nolan said. You will need to archive them individually.
